name: Copy Cat - HTC Vive
description:
Can you follow the patterns of lights and sounds in VR? This was built for the HTC Vive using Unity 3D. I played a similar game to this as a child and was a challenge I wanted to give to my kids without having yet another toy laying around the house.

Additional modes to be worked on in the future include:

  • Difficulty levels
  • 9 square dance pad
  • Drum set
  • Floor piano

This is my first VR game development, so understand that this is very alpha and being worked on to expand my skills with VR and Unity 3D. I created a similar version almost 20 years ago for the PalmOS and have done web development in the meantime.
